page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: SURVEY AREA 05720114 IS SITUATED IN EAST SUSSEX, ABOUT 7 MILES FROM HASTINGS.IT CONTAINS THE LARGE VILLAGE OF{BATTLE,}SITE OF THE BATTLE OF HASTINGS IN 1066. THE MAIN ATTRACTION IS THE{ABBEY,}WHICH WAS BUILT BY WILLIAM THE CONQUEROR, IN 1094. BATTLE'S MAIN FUNCTION IS AS A{TOURIST CENTRE, BUT IT ALSO PROVIDES LIMITED {SERVICES}FOR THE SURROUNDING RURAL AREA. IT IS SURROUNDED BY FARMLAND.THE VILLAGE ITSELF CONTAINS A VARIETY OF SHOPS WHICH CATER FOR LOCAL DAY-TO-DAY NEEDS, TOGETHER WITH GIFT SHOPS AIMED AT A SEASONAL TOURIST MARKET. SERVICES AVAILABLE IN BATTLE INCLUDE BANKS, BUILDING SOCIETIES, DOCTORS, DENTISTS AND SOLICITORS. BATTLE IS A PROSPEROUS VILLAGE WITH AN EXPANDING POPULATION.
